A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is beyond horrible. If this movie was left out of the franchise I would be happy because this movie shouldn't have been made. And don't get me started on the overrated red throne fight scene. That scene is so poorly done and I've never scene a worst fight scene. If you want proof look up Robot Head the last Jedi review and watch it for a deep dive on the abysmal scene. This movie is terrible
